name: Mortys
summary: Death is away from home too often collecting souls from dying humans. Her son Mortys is tired of being alone and comes up with a computerized system to speed up the collection and classification of souls at Death's HQ so he can enjoy his mother's company more. Mum thinks the old system is more enjoyable and gentle on humans and prefers it to the new one. However, Mortys is unstoppable. Written by GitanillaOZ
